header.title: Ematfuba eSalatiso OHS
intro.title: Kuphepha kweKwakha
intro.description: Cinisekisa kutelela emitemtfo yekuphepha kwekwakha ngetinsiza teSalatiso OHS. Tinsiza tetfu titfutfukisa kubusa ingoti, kutelela timfuneko temthetho, nekukhusela basebenti esayitini, kusetjentiswa tindlela letihle letichazwe ku-"Kuphepha Kwandlule: Lokubalulekile kwetinhlelo te-OHS."
legal_obligations.client.title: Tibopho teMklayenti
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Umthetho weKwakha 5(1)(a): Lungiselela kuhlola ingoti yekucala (BRA) lechaza tingoti teprojekti.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Umthetho weKwakha 5(1)(b): Niketa inchazelo yempilo nekuphepha lechaza timfuneko letikhethekile teprojekti.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Umthetho weKwakha 5(1)(l): Vumela umhlahlandlela wempilo nekuphepha wekhontraktha ngaphambi kwekutsi umsebenti uqale.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Tibopho teKhontraktha
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Umthetho weKwakha 7(1)(a): Hlela umhlahlandlela wempilo nekuphepha lotsatfwe ekuchazeni kweklayenti.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Umthetho weKwakha 7(1)(b): Gcina ifayili yempilo nekuphepha esayitini lenato tonkhe timfanelo temaphepha.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Umthetho weKwakha 9: Yenta kuhlola ingoti kanye nekuchaza ingoti (HIRAs) ngekukhethekile.
legal_obligations.professional.title: Tibopho teNdvuna ye-H&S
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Umthetho weKwakha 5(5): Ti-ejenti (PrCHSA) tilawula H&S egameni leklayenti, tiqinisekisa kutelela.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Umthetho weKwakha 8(5): Tin dvuna (CHSO) tisita bakhontraktha kusebentisa nekubheka tinhlelo te-H&S.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: Tinchazelo te-SACPCMP: Kufuneka agcine kubhalisa kanye netimfuneko te-CPD ngetindzima letisetsebi.
wizard.step_0: Sicela ukhetse umsebenti kute ucale inqubo.
wizard.step_1.title: Sinyatselo 1 se-9: Ufuna kwenta ntoni?
wizard.step_1.label: Khetsa emaphepha lotowahlanganisa (Khetsa tonkhe letisebentako):
wizard.step_1.error: Sicela ukhetse bonyana iphepha linye lotolihlanganisa.
wizard.step_2.title: Sinyatselo 2 se-9: Imininingwane Yeklayenti
wizard.step_3.title: Sinyatselo 3 se-9: Ingabe Ikhontraktha Ibekwe?
wizard.step_4.title: Sinyatselo 4 se-9: Imininingwane Yekhontraktha
wizard.step_5.title: Sinyatselo 5 se-9: Imininingwane Yeprojekti
wizard.step_6.title: Sinyatselo 6 se-9: Umkhawulo Weprojekti
wizard.step_7.title: Sinyatselo 7 se-9: Lahlanganiswe Ngu
wizard.step_8.title: Sinyatselo 8 se-9: Lahlanganiswe Nge
wizard.step_8.specify_error: Sicela uchaze kutsi iphepha lihlanganiselwe bani.
wizard.step_9.title: Sinyatselo 9 se-9: Bheka Kabusha Nekufaka eSigubeni
wizard.step_9.description: Bheka kabusha lokukhetsile bese ufaka emaphepha esigubeni sakho kute uqede.
cart.title: Sigubhu Sakho
cart.invoice_reference: Inombolo Yereferensi Ye-invoyisi: (Isebentaka emalanga lasitfupha. Bhalisa kute ugcine kunaphakade!)
resources.title: Tfontsela Baniketi Bemfundvo Be-H&S Labavunyiwako
resources.description: Udzinga lusito lwetsebi? Tfontsela baniketi bemfundvo labavunyiwako ngetifuno teprojekti yakho.
resources.jane_doe: Jane Doe, I-Ejenti ye-SACPCMP (PrCHSA) - Inombolo Yekubhalisa: PR12345 - Tfontsela: jane.doe@example.com
resources.john_smith: John Smith, Lidvuna le-SACPCMP (CHSO) - Inombolo Yekubhalisa: CHSO67890 - Tfontsela: john.smith@example.com
footer.copyright: © 2025 Ematfuba eSalatiso OHS. Wonkhe emalungelo agodliwe.
footer.newsletter.title: Hlala Ufundzile
sidebar.step_0.title: 📜 Kutelela kwe-OHS
sidebar.step_0.description: Cala ngekukhetsa insita kute uqinisekise kutelela Umthetho Wempilo Nekuphepha Emsebentini.
sidebar.step_0.fun_fact: ⚡ Indzaba Leyatiwe: Ingabe uyati kutsi emaphepha e-OHS latifanele anganciphisa tindzaba temsebenti nge-30%? Asicaleni!
sidebar.step_1.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_1.description: Umthetho weKwakha 5(1)(b) udzinga inchazelo yempilo nekuphepha kuto tonkhe tiprojekti, kantsi 7(1)(b) idzinga ifayili ye-H&S.
sidebar.step_1.fun_fact: 🛡️ Indzaba Leyatiwe: Inchazelo ye-H&S lecinile inganciphisa tingoti nge-30%! Ifana nesihlangu sekuphepha seprojekti yakho.
sidebar.step_2.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_2.description: Umthetho weKwakha 5: Emaklayenti kufanele anikete inchazelo yempilo nekuphepha futsi acinisekise kutelela kwabakhontraktha.
sidebar.step_2.fun_fact: 💼 Indzaba Leyatiwe: Emaklayenti lagcina kubhalisa kwe-COIDA angagwema tinhlawulo letinkhulu—gcina leyo nombolo isedvute!
sidebar.step_3.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_3.description: Umthetho weKwakha 7(1)(a): Bakhontraktha kufanele bahlele umhlahlandlela wempilo nekuphepha lotsatfwe ekuchazeni kweklayenti.
sidebar.step_3.fun_fact: 🤝 Indzaba Leyatiwe: Kubeka ikhontraktha kusheshe kungakhawulela kutelela—umsebenti wekubambisana wenta iphupho lekuphepha lisebente!
sidebar.step_4.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_4.description: Umthetho weKwakha 7(1)(b): Bakhontraktha kufanele bagcine ifayili yempilo nekuphepha esayitini lenato tonkhe timfanelo temaphepha.
sidebar.step_4.fun_fact: 📞 Indzaba Leyatiwe: Kuba nemininingwane yekutfintselwa yekhontraktha lelunge kungasindzisa lusuku ngesikhatsi sephuthuma—hlala utfintseka!
sidebar.step_5.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_5.description: Umthetho weKwakha 3(1): Imvume iyafuneka kweprojekti letingetulu kwe-R40,000 noma letithatha emalanga langetulu kwe-180.
sidebar.step_5.fun_fact: 🚧 Indzaba Leyatiwe: Emakheli esayiti lacacile asita tinsita letiphuthumako kute akufumane ngukushesha—ungavumeli siphoso sekubhala sicinde lusito!
sidebar.step_6.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_6.description: Umthetho weKwakha 9: Kuhlola ingoti kanye nekuchaza ingoti (HIRAs) ngekukhethekile kuyafuneka kuyo yonkhe imisebenti.
sidebar.step_6.fun_fact: 🔍 Indzaba Leyatiwe: Kubona imisebenti lenengozi kusheshe kunganciphisa tingoti nge-25%—ifana nekunika iprojekti yakho emandla ekuphepha!
sidebar.step_7.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_7.description: Tinchazelo te-SACPCMP: CHSO kanye ne-PrCHSA kufanele agcine kubhalisa kanye netimfuneko te-CPD kute acinisekise kutelela.
sidebar.step_7.fun_fact: 🧑‍💼 Indzaba Leyatiwe: Umuntfu losetsebi we-SACPCMP lobhalisiwe anganciphisa tingoti temthetho kakhulu—MVP yekuphepha yeprojekti yakho!
sidebar.step_8.title: 📋 Umthetho
sidebar.step_8.description: Umthetho weKwakha 5(1)(l): Emaklayenti kufanele avume umhlahlandlela we-H&S wekhontraktha ngaphambi kwekutsi umsebenti uqale.
sidebar.step_8.fun_fact: 📝 Indzaba Leyatiwe: Kubekwa lokucacile emaphepheni kungakhulisa kucaca kweprojekti—wonke umuntfu uyati indzima yakhe!
sidebar.step_9.title: 📜 Umthetho
sidebar.step_9.description: Umthetho Wempilo Nekuphepha Emsebentini: Emaphepha latifanele acinisekisa kutelela futsi akhusele bonkhe lababandzakanyekako.
sidebar.step_9.fun_fact: 🛒 Indzaba Leyatiwe: Sigubhu sakho sisita sakho sekuphepha—iphepha ngalinye lolifakako lenza iprojekti yakho iphephe kakhulu!
